questions.question: How do I create a rectangle?
How do I create an ellipse?
questions.answer: Use `editor.createEllipse()` and set `rx` (radius x) and `ry` (radius y) properties.

questions.question: Do shapes appear automatically after creation?
questions.answer: No, you must append them to a container like an artboard or group to make them visible.

questions.question: How do I add shapes to the page?
How do I apply fill and stroke to shapes?
How do I create complex shapes?
questions.answer: Use `editor.createPath(svgString)` with SVG path data to create custom shapes.
